QuestData.Title: The Emitter
QuestData.Description: $n, while you were out investigating the Shadow Ridge, Zhanaa here has been going on about the holographic emitter. You might want to speak with her.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Technician Zhanaa at the Crash Site in Ammen Vale.
QuestData.RewardText: I got it, I got it! I think I managed to fix the emitter! Here, I'll just activate this last crystal and that should do it.$B$BTake a look at the emitter, $n. It looks like it's beginning to work... someone is appearing!
